Ancestry-Shapeshifter -- Male Shapeshifter Novice Adventurer
Attributes (6 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d6 Strength: d6 Vigor: d10
Skills (12 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Alchemy: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Athletics: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4-1 Survival: (sma) d4
Battle: (sma) d4 Psionics: (sma) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d4 Weird Science: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Amorous: -2 on Tests by a foe w/the Attractive feature
Charismatic: May reroll Persuasion
Size: 0
Advances: 0 Improvement Points: 4 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 2; Edge: 2
Features
Edges (1 points): Fey Blood Hindrances: Amorous; Driven; Mean; Pacifist Shapeshifter Abilities: Change Shape; Charismatic; Secret+
Feature Notes:
Change Shape: Has Arcane Background (Gifted) feature
Driven: Personal goal affects decision-making
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Secret+: Hides knowledge to protect self or others from major trouble
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Tunic Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (d6+d4 R3"); Short Bow (2d6 R12"); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Fey Blood: May reroll when resisting enemy powers and spell-like effects
Pacifist: Will harm others only when no other option is available
Arcana
Power Count: 1 Power Points: 15
Powers: Disguise: (2 PP) R4" Target assumes another's appearance (familiar Notice-2 sees through (Raise Notice-4)) for 10 min (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Allows changing size by 2 steps)
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Gifted): 1 Powers/15 Power Points
Change Shape: May use Disguise as a limited free action to change own appearance
